data.actual_result: It should say showing Relevant searches instead of Recent. It says "Recent" filter and shows "Relevant" searches
data.expected_result: It shouldn't show "Recent" as selected and show "Relevant" searches. It should stay on the filter you clicked on.
data.short_description: Searching for something in the filter in the search bar.. clicking off then the filter changes by itself
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 2: Click on "Relevant" searches - Step 3: Now click onto another server - Step 4: Now go back to the same server you searched in - Step 5: Now it goes back to "Recent" and shows "Relevant" searches
